story_04_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Well, well!
What a wonderful battle.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You’re like a hardy root, spreading deep into
the soil to connect your teammates to
one another...
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But I also see a calm, quiet oak within you,
standing tall... A kind heart that cares for
those around you.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I see all of these things when I look at you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. So it’s with great
joy that I now present you with this.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We did it!
We got our first badge!
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
One more thing...
Would it be all right if I asked you 
one small favor?
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: What kind of favor are we talking about?
story_04_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, I was wondering if it would be
all right if I joined your team.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you are going to
bloom into a beautiful flower as this competition
goes on. I’d love to be there to see it firsthand.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, that’s pretty flattering and all...
but wouldn’t it be weird for a PML Leader
to join a team?
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Not at all. I’ve been told that I’m free to
participate in any way I like.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
In fact, I believe there are a fair number 
of other PML Leaders in charge of 
the same badge that I’ve just given you.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Huh, I see... Guess I have no objection, then.
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_04_05000/2401_0301_1500_10: Of course! Welcome to the team!
story_04_05000/2401_0401_1600_10:
Thank you so much!
I look forward to competing together soon.
story_04_05000/2401_0302_1700_10:
Let’s see what sort of flower 
we bloom into together!
story_04_05000/2401_0402_1800_10:
Of course! I look forward to being there
when it happens.
story_04_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Right! Time to hunt for the next badge, then!
story_04_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Oh! I think I might actually know another
one of the PML Leaders!
story_04_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
She’s from the Unova region, like me—
a Gym Leader who uses Flying-type Pokémon!
